alert.note: Alert for Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Harrison and Jackson Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 643 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Wiggins to 6 miles east of Saucier to Lyman. Movement was southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Moss Point, St. Martin, Escatawpa, Gautier, D`iberville, Wade, Latimer, Gulf Hills, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates, Hickory Hills and Helena. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 37 and 70. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southern Mississippi.
